en_US:
Owwwwwww…
My head is killing me…
I must have partied too hard last night.
I don't really remember…

Wait, where am I?
I can't believe I just passet out outside somewhere.
Uhhh… is this somebody's yard?
That sure is a huge castle-y-looking house if so. Maybe this is some new nightclub my friends dragged me to.
Well I better get up and get moving before someone sees me and calls the cops.
